body.name: ruboka 2-Shelf Tree Bookshelf with Storage, 26.5-Inch Retro Floor Standing Bookcase Display for CDs/Magazine/Books, Small Bookshelf for Bedroom, Living Room, Office, Brown Storage Shelves DESK51B
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [ Perfect Small Bookshelf ] -- The tree bookshelf has 2 storage areas & 1 storage cabinets, each storage area can hold 5-10 books. Keeps your books, decorations, CDs, movies and video games well organized. Its simple design allows the storage shelves taking up only a small space in the room; Suitable placed in the apartment, living room ,study, bedroom becomes a unique decoration.

[ Retro Tree Design ] - - Classic warm chestnut brown color floor standing tree bookcase. This small bookcase is constructed of premium MDF, makes it no smell and environmental friendly. The geometric tree structure & anti-dumping accessories makes the bookshelves storage rack more stable, enough to support the weight of the book without falling over.

[ Thickened MDF ] : Made of 0.5 inch (1.3 cm) thick MDF and high-quality hardware, the bookshelf for bedroom is sturdy and durable; The reinforcement of its back panel strictly follows the geometric engineering design and the t-shaped support is used to stabilize the load; Each layer of the book shelves could take up to 6.6 lbs (3 kg) weight.

[ Easy to Assemble & Clean ] - - Hassle-free assembly. With the help of the easy to follow instructions, numbered parts, and an assembly tool, this bookcase can be assembled quickly and easily. Finished with wood grain veneer, this desktop bookshelf is resistant to water stains, friction and easy to clean.

[ 2-Year Warranty ] - -We provide 24 months warranty and lifetime customer support for this industrial tree bookshelf. If you have any problem with our tree bookcases, please feel free to contact us, our friendly customer service team will always here for you.
body.description: Why Need This Multi-functional Tree Bookshelf? Ruboka 2-Shelf Tree Bookcase & Storage Bins Pre-reserved hole, uniform parts, and detailed instructions allow you to assemble this book shelf quickly. The book shelves made of premium durable thickened MDF, which ensure its stability and security. Unique 2-tier step & Storage Bins designfurnishes roomy space for storage and display, perfect choice of your home and office. The tree-shaped bookshelf are suitable to be placed on your bedroom, living room, study, and even office carpets, desktops, and end tables. Ample storage space, each "V" shaped area can be loaded with 5-10 books, storage bins can load more, depending on the size and thickness of your books of course. This bookshelf saves you from finding a book from a stack of things with totally opening and displaying design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well-made!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing tree bookshelf for the price! I was hesitant to purchase this product but after doing thorough research, comparing other similar bookshelves and reading the reviews I finally went ahead and purchased. I'm so glad I made this purchase - it shipped fast and arrived earlier than the expected date. I recommend choosing the option of shipping it in an Amazon box so that way it's more protected and people can't see what it is, otherwise this ships in it's original packaging and it shows exactly what's inside and it could be prone to damage. Once I took everything out of the box I saw what was included: the panels of wood, hardware for the setup and the instruction manual to assemble it. I was surprised to see the instructions were very detailed and had easy to follow diagrams and everything was numbered including the wooden panels. It doesn't take that long to assemble - it took me about 2 hours total because I have arthritis in my hands and wrists and not much strength to my grip so I made sure to take my time and screw everything in correctly. I included a picture of the finished product and do want to note that no pieces were missing I just preferred the open look on the bottom storage opening but you can either set it up like how it is pictured with the wooden back wall or if you want a more spacious and open look then you can choose to not install the back wall and just leave it open. I'm very impressed with the quality of the wood and there is no odor at all so I'm really happy about that. As you can also see I have already added books to my shelf and it fits a lot of heavy hardcovers; the key is to make sure you install the bottom feet/footing because it helps balance the whole shelf and makes sure it doesn't tip over. It also includes pieces to install wall mounting but for me it wasn't necessary. Overall I am very pleased with this bookshelf - it's unique and small but holds a lot. I highly recommend purchasing this - don't hesitate at all because for the price it's beautiful and well-made!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: It's perfect for my nightstand, and really looks nice. Love everything about it. And it's unique.Easy to assemble and holds quite a few book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This unit is awesome. It feels expensive once assembled. Very sturdy. Out of the box, it may seem overwhelming, because there are several pieces, and lots of hardware. But the manual is written well, with great instructions and very accurate visuals (pay close attention to the patterns of the pre-drilled holes as it could be easy to assemble wrong based on assumptions!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Piece But Holes Not Drilled
reviews.reviewText: I'm just a chick who doesn't usually build a lot of furniture and whose tools pretty much consist of a very old hammer, a rusty wrench and one power screwdriver that I can occasionally find in the closet. Therefore, I was really appreciative when I opened the Ruboka bookshelf and found well-labeled parts, included tools and, given some of the other nightmares I've seen since moving, pretty clear instructions. What a relief! Alas, some of the boards were lacking in the drilled holes necessary to properly build it. They weren't partially drilled so you could punch through them. They were just not drilled at all. So, lacking a drill or a new neighbor with a tool fetish, and not wanting to unbuild it and rebox it (egads), I just used the holes available. So far it seems reasonably sturdy even with the missing anchors and since it's only books and low to the ground, I'm willing to chance it coming apart one day. Fingers crossed.On the plus side it's a nice-looking display piece that doesn't take up much room and gives a few of your books a moment in the spotlight. If you're lucky enough to get one that made it through the drilling phase properly it could be perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Shelf!
reviews.reviewText: First, I consider the quality of this shelf to be pretty stellar, as far as assemble-it-yourself furniture goes. Mine looks exactly as advertised online- quite a lovely stain, with a cool, trendy design. It’s actually at least as durable as I’d hoped it would be (without getting my hopes up), which I could tell even before assembling.The assembly instructions are very clear and easy to follow- but do read and follow them!Awesome detail- tools you need are provided. Be sure to use correct tools according to instructions. Don’t be like me and start out assuming it’s fine to use the phillips-head screwdriver for everything! They GIVE you the correct, easiest tool for each step, so needless hand cramps and frustration are totally avoidable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little shelf.
reviews.reviewText: I needed more bookshelves, but I don't have enough room to put another large one in, so I got this little one and have relegated it my 'happy shelf' for wholesome/happy books. Assembly was incredibly simple, it took around 15 minutes and it came with detailed instructions and extra screws in case one was missing. Overall it's a very good sturdy little shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice mini bookshelf!
reviews.reviewText: The bookshelf is very cute! Yes, the dimensions were provided in the description but it was a bit smaller than I expected. The assembly instructions are very thorough and easy to follow. I was actually a bit nervous about the top tree part but it can hold a fairly good amount of books and it’s very stable. I’m loving it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: I think this is my first Amazon review. This book tree worked out PERFECTLY. It's small, as searched for and advertised (I don't understand some of the negative reviews regarding its dimensions- they're documented.) There was a thorough -and polite- instruction manual. You see there's a significant ount of books on it and it seems VERY sturdy. I'm more than pleased with it!!

I absolutely love this bloody-brilliant idea of a “tree bookshelf”. I got the idea of putting it on my tall bookshelf, and I am utterly in love with it. It keeps my Gothic (and adjacent) collection together, which is what I needed it for. Assembling it wasn’t too hard; the package comes with a small screw driver and things like that to help with the process. It took me over three hours because I was alone, I am not good at those things, and I made two mistakes. Other people may have an easier time, though. In the end, it got done, and I couldn’t be happier. I have no complaints about it at all. (Also, for those into DIY, you could get the lighter one and spray-paint it.)
Happy with my order, it is sturdy and easily assembled.
